2164.subject: CST
2164.descrlong:
Examines database design and implementation using microcomputer database tools. Discusses data management concepts and terminology currently in practice in the business world, including data and database administration, fundamentals of database management systems and models (network, hierarchical and relational), data sharing, retrieval, data dictionaries, data proliferation, data integrity, and queries using SQL. (Offered spring semester.) (Cross listed under MIT and BUS.)

(Prereq: BUS 308 and BUS 363)
